result.arabic_text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ
result.translation: Emwe bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo! Nimwaharanira idini ry’Imana Allah ku rugamba, mukagendera n’ingingo z’Igitabu cayo, Izobatabara maze muneshe abansi banyu, Yongere Ibatsimbataze ku rugamba.
